sec.title: Abstract
sec.p:
Two new species of genus
Metanigrus Tsaur, Yang & Wilson, 1986
(Fulgoromorpha, Meenoplidae ),
M. afflatus
sp. nov.
from Hainan Province and
M. angularus
sp. nov.
from Yunnan Province , are described and illustrated, bringing the total number of species within the genus to 8. An updated checklist and identification key to known species of
Metanigrus
are provided.

sec.title: Introduction
sec.p:
The genus
Metanigrus
( Meenoplidae : Meenoplinae) was established by
for
M. yami Tsaur, Yang & Wilson, 1986
( type species) from Taiwan .
and Lv et al . (2021) added one and four species to the genus from China , respectively. The genus now includes six known species. Herein, two new
Metanigrus species
,
M. afflatus
sp. nov.
and
M. angularus
sp. nov.
, are described from China . An updated checklist and identification key to species of the genus are given as well as a map of their geographic distributions.

sec.title: Materials and methods
sec.p: The types and the specimens examined are deposited in the Institute of Entomology, Guizhou University, Guiyang, Guizhou Province , China (GUGC).
